Package de.awi.floenavigation.waypoint

This package provides the necessary activity to process Waypoints in the App.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WaypointActivity
    WaypointActivity activity is used to install the waypoints at specific points of interest on the sea ice.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.waypoint Description

This package provides the necessary activity to process Waypoints in the App. WaypointActivity is called from the MainActivity when the grid initial setup is completed.

Waypoints can be any poinnt of interest on the Ice. Each Waypoint has a unique name which is given by the user. To ensure that the Waypoint names remain unique throughout the DatabaseHelper.tabletId is appended to the name provided by the user. The User can delete previously created waypoints. Previously created Waypoints can be viewed by tapping the View Waypoints button on the WaypointActivity. This list is created by using the ListViewActivity and it displays the name, and x,y position of each waypoint currently existing in the database. Waypoints created in other tablets can also viewed after the Synchronization Process.

See Also:
SyncActivity, Waypoints
